If you have any questions about our events, our services, or our culture, please contact us Where Every Detail is a Masterpiece Explore Contact Us We are always ready to serve you Name Email Address Message I accept this - Privacy Policy Send Where We Are We are always ready to serve you Location Bastar, Chhattisgarh, India Email Golden@gmail.com Telephone +91 (231) 486-78-94 Quantifying Passion 50+ Years of Combined Experience With over 50 years of collective experience, our team brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to every event. From seasoned chefs to skilled event coordinators, our diverse talents ensure flawless execution and unforgettable culinary experiences. 1000+ Happy Clients Served We've had the privilege of serving over 1000 satisfied clients, each one a testament to our commitment to excellence. Whether it's a wedding, corporate function, or intimate gathering, our team strives to exceed expectations and create lasting memories for every occasion. 5000+ Mouthwatering Dishes Created Over the years, we've crafted more than 5000 mouthwatering dishes, each one a culinary masterpiece in its own right. From elegant hors d'oeuvres to decadent desserts, our creations are as diverse as they are delicious, reflecting our passion for innovative cuisine. FAQ Frequently Asked Questions 1. What types of cuisine does Golden Restaurant offer? Golden Restaurant specializes in a diverse array of cuisines, focusing on healthy and tasty dishes made with natural ingredients. Our menu features a blend of classic favorites and innovative creations, all crafted with fresh, locally-sourced produce. 2. Do you offer vegetarian or vegan options? Yes, we offer a variety of vegetarian and vegan options to cater to different dietary preferences. Our chefs take great care in creating flavorful and satisfying plant-based dishes using the finest ingredients. 3. Can I make a reservation online? Absolutely! You can easily make a reservation through our website. Simply visit our Reservations page, select your desired date and time, and provide the necessary details. We recommend booking in advance to secure your preferred dining time. 4. Do you accommodate dietary restrictions and allergies? Yes, we are committed to accommodating dietary restrictions and allergies. Please inform our staff of any specific requirements when making your reservation or upon arrival. Our chefs will be happy to modify dishes to meet your needs. 5. What are your operating hours? Golden Restaurant is open Monday through Saturday from 11:00 AM to 10:00 PM, and on Sundays from 11:00 AM to 9:00 PM. Please check our website for any special holiday hours or events that may affect our regular schedule. Golden See More Main About Menu Blog Contact Legal Privacy Policy Disclaimer Terms & Conditions © 2024 Golden. All rights reserved.

Accept Golden About Menu Blog Contact See More Welcome to Golden: Disclaimer Golden is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and disclose personal information from our users. Where Every Detail is a Masterpiece Explore Disclaimer Golden Restaurant 1. Nutritional Information While we make every effort to provide accurate nutritional information for our menu items, we cannot guarantee that all information is completely error-free. We encourage our customers to consider their individual dietary needs and consult with a healthcare professional if they have any concerns. 2. Allergens We take the presence of allergens very seriously and have implemented strict procedures to ensure that all menu items are properly labeled and prepared. However, we cannot guarantee that cross-contamination will not occur. Customers with food allergies should inform a member of our staff before ordering to ensure that appropriate measures are taken. 3. Pricing and Availability We endeavor to ensure that all pricing and product availability information on our website is up to date and accurate. However, unforeseen circumstances may result in pricing changes or menu items becoming unavailable. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. 4. Third-Party Websites Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We have no control over the contents of these websites and cannot assume responsibility for their accuracy, reliability, or safety. We encourage our customers to exercise caution when visiting third-party websites. 5. User Contributions Our website may include features that allow users to submit comments, reviews, or other content. We reserve the right to remove or edit any content that we deem inappropriate or offensive. Users who violate our terms of use may be banned from our website. 6. Intellectual Property All content on our website, including text, images, and logos, is the property of Golden Restaurant or its licensors and is protected by copyright and trademark laws. Any unauthorized use of our intellectual property is strictly prohibited. 7. Limitation of Liability We make no warranties or representations regarding the accuracy, reliability, or safety of any aspect of our website or the products and services we offer. We are not liable for any damages, including but not limited to direct, indirect, or consequential damages, arising from the use of our website or the products and services we offer. 8. Indemnification Users of our website agree to indemnify and hold harmless Golden Restaurant and its affiliates, directors, officers, and employees from any and all claims, liabilities, and damages arising from the use of our website or the products and services we offer. Contact Us: If you have any questions. ask us: Golden@gmail.com Golden See More Main About Menu Blog Contact Legal Privacy Policy Disclaimer Terms & Conditions © 2024 Golden. All rights reserved.

pages.policy: Golden Restaurant Privacy Policy: Understand How We Protect Your Personal Information x To optimize your experience on our platform, we employ cookies. These cookies aid in retaining your preferences, personalizing content and ads, analyzing site traffic, and enhancing our services. Accept Golden About Menu Blog Contact See More Welcome to Golden: Privacy Policy Golden is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and disclose personal information from our users. Where Every Detail is a Masterpiece Explore Privacy Policy - Golden Restaurant I. Information We Collect 1. When you provide it to us directly: We may collect information about you when you fill out a form, make a reservation, or communicate with us offline. This may include your name, email address, phone number, and other contact information. 2. Automatically through your use of our website: When you use our website, we may automatically collect information about your device and your usage of our website. This may include your IP address, browser type, device type, and operating system. We may also collect information about your browsing history, search queries, and interactions with our website. II. How We Use Your Information 1. To provide and improve our services: We use your information to process your reservations, respond to your inquiries, and provide you with a high-quality dining experience. We may also use your information to improve our services and make them more user-friendly. 2. To communicate with you: We may use your information to send you updates, newsletters, and marketing materials. You can opt-out of these communications at any time. 3. To comply with legal obligations: We may use your information to comply with applicable laws, regulations, and legal processes. III. How We Share Your Information 1. Service providers: We may share your information with service providers who perform services on our behalf, such as payment processors, data analytics providers, and hosting providers. 2. Business partners: We may share your information with our business partners, such as other restaurants or event venues. 3. Legal purposes: We may disclose your information if we believe it is necessary to comply with applicable laws, regulations, or legal processes. IV. Cookies and Similar Technologies We use cookies and similar technologies to collect information about your use of our website. Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device and allow us to recognize you when you return to our website. We use cookies to improve the functionality of our website, to analyze traffic to our website, and to personalize your experience on our website. V. Your Rights and Choices You have the following rights and choices with respect to your information: 1. Access: You have the right to request access to the information we hold about you. 2. Correction: You have the right to correct any inaccurate or incomplete information we hold about you. 3. Deletion: You have the right to request that we delete your information. VI. Data Retention We retain your information for as long as necessary to provide you with our services and to comply with our legal obligations. We may also retain and use your information as necessary to resolve disputes, enforce our agreements, and protect our rights. VII. Security We take reasonable measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, so we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your information. VIII. Children's Privacy Our website is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of 13. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child under the age of 13, we will take steps to delete such information as soon as possible. Contact Us: If you have any questions. ask us: Golden@gmail.com Golden See More Main About Menu Blog Contact Legal Privacy Policy Disclaimer Terms & Conditions © 2024 Golden. All rights reserved.

pages.thanks: Thanks for Choosing Golden Restaurant: Join Us for a Memorable Dining Experience Thanks for Choosing Golden Restaurant At Golden Restaurant, we're committed to providing an unforgettable dining experience that tantalizes your taste buds, delights your senses, and leaves you feeling satisfied. We extend our heartfelt gratitude for choosing our establishment as your culinary destination. From the moment you step through our doors, we strive to create a warm and inviting atmosphere that sets the stage for a memorable evening. Our dedicated team is passionate about serving you exquisite dishes prepared with the freshest ingredients and meticulous attention to detail. We believe that a truly exceptional meal begins with the finest ingredients, meticulously sourced and prepared with skill and care. We're constantly seeking to elevate our offerings and surpass your expectations. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion, enjoying a romantic dinner, or simply indulging in a delicious meal with friends and family, we're here to make your visit truly exceptional. Every dish we serve is a testament to our commitment to using the finest ingredients available. Our chefs hand-select the freshest produce, meats, and seafood, ensuring that every element of your meal is of the highest quality. We believe that true culinary excellence begins with the foundation of impeccable ingredients. Our chefs are culinary artists, passionate about creating dishes that not only tantalize your taste buds but also delight the eye. Each plate is meticulously presented, showcasing a harmonious blend of textures, flavors, and colors that will elevate your dining experience to new heights. Golden Restaurant offers a unique and inviting ambiance that complements our exceptional cuisine. Whether you prefer the warm and intimate setting of our cozy booths or the lively energy of our spacious dining room, we provide an environment that sets the stage for a memorable evening. A truly exceptional dining experience is about far more than just the food. Our team of dedicated servers is committed to providing attentive and personalized service that ensures your every need is met. We strive to anticipate your desires and create an experience that is both seamless and unforgettable. While our food is undoubtedly a highlight, we believe that a complete dining experience encompasses far more. We offer a carefully curated selection of fine wines and spirits, perfectly paired to complement our culinary offerings. Our ambiance is designed to transport you, creating a space where you can unwind, relax, and savor the moment. At Golden Restaurant, we strive to create an experience that goes beyond the ordinary. We want you to feel welcomed, cherished, and pampered. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion, enjoying a romantic dinner, or simply gathering with friends and family, we're here to make your visit unforgettable. Your patronage means the world to us. We're passionate about creating a dining experience that exceeds your expectations, and your continued support empowers us to pursue this mission. We appreciate the trust you place in us to create unforgettable memories through delicious food and exceptional service. We invite you to experience the Golden Restaurant difference for yourself. Discover our exquisite dishes, embrace our warm and inviting atmosphere, and enjoy unparalleled service that will make your visit truly special. Home
